class_notes: BSHES Students Only. S/U grading basis only.
course_description: The thesis requires the conceptualization, design and implementation of an original project resulting in the preparation of a scholarly document. Organized as a directed study with the thesis chair, students develop and refine research questions, conduct a review and analysis of the public health knowledge base, select a theory or organizing framework, formulate a plan for data collection and an IRB application, and draft the initial three chapters of their project.
prerequisites: This class is for BSHESMPH students only.
sections: Class Nbr: 3101, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: E. Walker, Status: Open
